comments:

Deleting the configuration directory allowed Eclipse to start.

Moving to Equinox.
Note that I can start i0504 (winXP) with no problems.

Did you change anything in your install folder?
Is it possible that you would have partially deleted the configuration folder?
Were you starting with -clean?


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 50993 ***
